title: RIOT Seriously?
body:
A guy who lose 8 gams out of 10 and did worst every game Feed+troll tame ra as me who Win 8mes out of 10 ? ( Silver 3) I was S1 last season and almost Gold so many times --{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 


Fix your sh.itty system plz{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: my first season playing ranked and i won 7/10 games and get put in bronze 4? yet i know of a guy who was b5 last season 0lp won 5/5 gets put in b3? id love to know how it works.

There was an issue with placements for flex in preseason, so assuming that player did not play the extra reset placement B5 may not have been their proper rank. Otherwise someone in B5 should not have been placed in B3.

Thats cause riots still condoning trolling because "DER OPPRESSIONS"

3rd game tonight and its the 3rd game in a row with 4 trolls. 
Reasons all the same: "If I can't make gold, nor can you"
FML man, and I was almost gold if I didn't lose my promos -_-" seems long way now

I addressed this in your other post:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/F9U5rqhn-15lp-after-winning-game-wtf-riot
